mesos/master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. The format is a comma-delimited list of hosts like zk://host1:port,host2:port/mesos. If using ZooKeeper, pay particular attention to the leading zk:// and trailing /mesos! If not using ZooKeeper, standard URLs like http://localhost are also acceptable.

hdfs/state.zk.description: The zookeeper URL(s) that the framework should use to persist its frameworkId and task state.

hdfs/zkfc.ha.zookeeper.quorum.description: The zookeeper URL(s) to fill into hdfs-site.xml for the NameNodes and DataNodes.

hdfs/scheduler-uris.description: The URI(s) of the hdfs-mesos tarball, which will be extracted and used to run the scheduler.
